com.ppdai.platform.das.codegen.config

类 APIBeanConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ppdai.platform.das.codegen.config.APIBeanConfiguration

  • @Configuration
public class APIBeanConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Provide default API beans, if no specific beans are found in Spring context. Users could implement following beans to fulfill their requirement.
